subject: Olympic Games
Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: The tiny town of Warroad, Minn., which has as many indoor rinks (two) as red lights, has produced eight Olympic hockey players. The hope is for a pair of golds at the Sochi Games.
snippet: The tiny town of Warroad, Minn., which has as many indoor rinks (two) as red lights, has produced eight Olympic hockey players. The hope is for a pair of golds at the Sochi Games.
